sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , T1.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , T1.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , T1.REQ_USR_NM AS REQ_USR_NM , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID AS REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM AS REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL AS REQ_USR_EMAIL , T1.REQ_USR_NUM AS REQ_USR_NUM , T1.REQ_USR_IMG_ID AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_ID AS REQ_CHARGER_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , T1.REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL AS REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL , T1.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_DTM AS REQ_DTM , T1.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM , T1.REQ_PW AS REQ_PW , T1.PROCESS_ID AS PROCESS_ID , T1.FLOW_ID AS FLOW_ID FROM ( SELECT A.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , A.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.REQ_DESC AS REQ_DESC , NVL(REQ_USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID AS REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM AS REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL AS REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM AS REQ_USR_NUM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '6') AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 1) AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 6) AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 2) AS REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW , A.PROCESS_ID AS PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID AS FLOW_ID FROM REQ4100 A JOIN SPR1100 B ON (A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = B.PRJ_GRP_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.SPR_ID = #sprId#
AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '02'
AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.REQ_DTM DESC
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.REQ_ORD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.PRJ_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_KEY LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , T1.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , T1.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID AS REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM AS REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL AS REQ_USR_EMAIL , T1.REQ_CHARGER_DEPT_ID AS REQ_CHARGER_DEPT_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_DEPT_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_DEPT_NM , T1.REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL AS REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL , T1.REQ_CHARGER_NUM AS REQ_CHARGER_NUM , T1.REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_DTM AS REQ_DTM , T1.REG_DTM , T1.REQ_ST_DTM , T1.REQ_ED_DTM , T1.REQ_ST_DU_DTM , T1.REQ_ED_DU_DTM , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_NEW_TYPE , T1.REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_TYPE_CD , T1.REQ_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_PW AS REQ_PW , T1.PROCESS_ID AS PROCESS_ID , T1.FLOW_ID AS FLOW_ID , T1.SPR_POINT AS SPR_POINT FROM ( SELECT A.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , A.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.REQ_DESC AS REQ_DESC , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID AS REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM AS REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL AS REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 1) AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 6) AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 2) AS REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM AS REQ_USR_NUM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '6') AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , A.USR_NM AS USR_NM , A.REQ_ST_DTM , A.REQ_ED_DTM , A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM , A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQ_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW , A.PROCESS_ID AS PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID AS FLOW_ID , B.SPR_POINT AS SPR_POINT FROM REQ4100 A JOIN SPR1100 B ON (A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = B.PRJ_GRP_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.SPR_ID = #sprId#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.REQ_DTM DESC
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.SPR_POINT IS NULL
AND T1.REQ_ORD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.PRJ_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '02'
AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04'

SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_NM , T1.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , T1.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , T1.REQ_USR_NM AS REQ_USR_NM , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID AS REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM AS REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL AS REQ_USR_EMAIL , T1.REQ_USR_NUM AS REQ_USR_NUM , T1.REQ_USR_IMG_ID AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_ID AS REQ_CHARGER_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , T1.REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL AS REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL , T1.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_DTM AS REQ_DTM , T1.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM , T1.REQ_PW AS REQ_PW , T1.PROCESS_ID AS PROCESS_ID , T1.FLOW_ID AS FLOW_ID FROM ( SELECT A.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , A.REQ_NM AS REQ_NM , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.REQ_DESC AS REQ_DESC , NVL(REQ_USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID AS REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM AS REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL AS REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM AS REQ_USR_NUM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '6') AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 1) AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 6) AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 2) AS REQ_CHARGER_EMAIL , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_ORD AS REQ_ORD , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE AS REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW , A.PROCESS_ID AS PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID AS FLOW_ID FROM REQ4100 A LEFT JOIN SPR1100 B ON (A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = B.PRJ_GRP_ID AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.SPR_ID=#sprId#) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE IN ('01', '02') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT B.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID FROM SPR1100 C WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND C.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID AND C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND C.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND C.REQ_ID = A.REQ_ID ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT B.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID FROM REQ4100 D INNER JOIN SPR1100 E ON (E.PRJ_GRP_ID = D.PRJ_GRP_ID AND E.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND E.REQ_ID = D.REQ_ID) INNER JOIN SPR1000 F ON(E.SPR_ID = F.SPR_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND E.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND E.PRJ_GRP_ID = A.PRJ_GRP_ID AND E.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND E.REQ_ID = A.REQ_ID AND F.SPR_TYPE_CD != '03' )
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY A.REQ_DTM DESC
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.PRJ_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_ORD LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT MAX(NVL(A.REQ_LINK_ORD, 0))+1 AS NEW_REQ_LINK_ORD FROM SPR1100 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #paramSprId#
INSERT INTO SPR1100 ( LIC_GRP_ID, PRJ_GRP_ID, PRJ_ID ,SPR_ID, REQ_ID, REQ_LINK_ORD ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #prjGrpId#, #prjId# ,#paramSprId#, #reqId#, #newReqLinkOrd# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM SPR1100 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId#
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SPR1100 A SET A.SPR_POINT = #sprPoint# WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #paramSprId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
UPDATE SPR1100 A SET A.REQ_RESULT_DESC = #reqResultDesc# WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.SPR_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.SPR_POINT , A.REQ_RESULT_DESC , A.REQ_LINK_ORD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM SPR1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.SPR_ID = #sprId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ) Z WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
